asMap

public static Map<String,String> asMap(String string)
Read a Map from string. 
 string ::= entry [ ';' entry ]*
 entry ::= key [ '=' value ]
 key ::= id [ '.' id ]

Parameters:
string -
Returns:
The parsed Map
